context_bundle.content:
MVP development approach for startups.

Phase 1 - Validate (1-2 weeks):
- Problem interviews
- Solution sketches
- Landing page test

Phase 2 - Build (2-4 weeks):
- Core feature only
- No premature optimization
- Manual processes OK

Phase 3 - Measure (ongoing):
- Key metrics defined
- Analytics integrated
- User feedback loops

Tech Stack for Speed:
- Next.js/Remix for full-stack
- Supabase/Firebase for backend
- Vercel/Railway for deployment
- Stripe for payments
